metadata.title: NDVYXX Women Sherpa Lined Sweatpants Winter Joggers Plus Size Elastic Waist Printed Casual Pants with Pockets
features: Design: Fleece lined pants, Thermal Sherpa Lined design, keep you warm in cold winter; Elastic waist with drawstring for comfortable wearing; Ribbed openings, it is more thermal and windproof;Simple design but still fashion

Feature: Toasty fleece pants with two side pockets that are roomy enough for daily life and warm your hands in cold weather; french terry fleece jogger pants, casual loose jogger sweatpants, comfy relax fit fashionable drawstring jogger

Occasion: Active elastic waist sweatpants is suit for casual, home, outdoor in the winter; This plus-size sweatpants allows you to move freely and it is very convenient for skiing, running and other winter outdoor activities

Collocation: Fuzzy sweatpants is suitable for matching with hoodies and sweatshirts for a warm winter; They always make a great Christmas, Thanks Giving Day, Birthday gift to your mother, wife, grandmother, daughter, and maternity wearing
Notice: Please take a look at our SIZE CHART before you purchase; Recommend hand-washing or machine-washing with cold water, lay flat to dry, please do not bleach
